titles: You did everything by yourself! Get some friends ... or not, I don't care.
You played the game. Good job. Others would be nice tho.
Being a solo player is tough, but you made it work!
You are a one-person army. Respect.
Solo is fun but lonely, welp can't say we expected much.
You're not depressed are you?
You carried your team, but also did the worst, thus you are average.
At least get a bot to join you smh
You really carried the team. Congratulations! W Plonker
You're the real MVP! Your team couldn't have done it without you
Look down on your team, you are carrying them. Request a raise
LMAO look at the others
Scroll though the team, we've labeled the highest disappointment just for you. :)
You carried your team I guess, or not, IDK how well you did.
Smh Smh ... You really don't want this title, you know?
Your team relied on you the least. Oof.
You were dead weight for your team :'(. Try harder next time.
Your team would have done better without you ... just saying.
Go watch some Rainbolt, that might help
You know I'd love to be motivational, but there's little to work with.
I support all skill levels, just maybe play so solo for a bit.
You were neither the best nor the worst. Just ... meh ... congrats?
You played the game. That's something I guess.
You are not last, you are not first, you are ... average.
You are the definition of mediocrity. Embrace it!
You are the human embodiment of 'just okay'.
... no words. At least you aren't the last, I guess?
Congrats you can look down on some amount of teammates?
